content.text: Not too bad! My father had a heart attack recently and I'm trying to get my mind off of it.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. How is he doing now?
He's doing a little better. He's in the hospital for a few days, but he's expected to make a full recovery.
That's good to hear. I'm sure he's glad to have you there for him.
Thanks. I'm trying to be there for him as much as I can.
What do you do for fun?
I like to keep my mind active by learning new things and trying new challenges. I also enjoy putting alcohol in my coffee.
That sounds like fun. I like to play video games and go to concerts.
I've never been to a concert before, but I've always wanted to go.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks. I'm glad you're chatting with me. It's helped distract me from what's going on.
I'm glad I could help. I'm here for you if you need anything.
